article_title: Commissioner, Tax Advocate Talk 2015 Tax Season

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Worried about the upcoming tax season? So are IRS Commissioner John Koskinen and National Taxpayer Advocate Nina Olson. I sat down with both of them to talk about challenges for the upcoming season, including coping with budget cuts, increased compliance concerns due to ACA, FATCA and the extenders and a delay to the tax season.
og.title: Miserable, Awful & Delayed: Commissioner, Tax Advocate Talk 2015 Tax Season
